verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Aanada maananda mayenu naadu priya Kumaaruni yandu mahaananda{/lang-eng}

verse.name: c2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Naa thanyuni maata vinandani shabda Mokkati yaa meghamulo udbavinche adbuthamuga{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Preminchu chunnaavu neethini durneetini Dweshinchi naavu neevu anduche nee thotivaari Kante aananda thailamutho thandri ninnu Adhikambuga nabhishekinchenu{/lang-eng}
{lang-tel}ప్రేమించుచున్నావు నీతిని దుర్నీతిని ద్వేషించినావు నీవు అందుచే నీతోటి వారికంటె ఆనంద తైలముతో తండ్రి నిన్ను అధికంబుగ నభిషేకించెను ǁమహానందమానంద మాయెను{/lang-tel}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Antya dinamula yanduna aa vintha kumaaruni Dwaaraa ee maanavula thoda maatlaadenu Sarvambunaku thandri thanayuni vaarasunigaa Niyaminchenu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thanayunde aa thandri mahima aa thatwampu Roopamubu thaane mahaathya mainatti maatacheta Samasthamunu nirvahinchuchu andarilo Ati shrestu daaye{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Neevu naadu kumaarudavu ninnu preminchi Kannaanu nenu nedu dandiga thanayuni Muddaadudi nindugaayana naashrayinchudi Randi randi dhanyulu kandi{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Vijnaana sampada lellanu aa sujnaanilo Gupta maayenu aa santoshamunu parishuddata Samaadhaanamu neethi shakhtiyu Vimochana maayenu yesu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Andari kannaa nee venthano ati sundarudavai Yunnaavu neevu nee pedavula meeda poyabadi Nindi yunnadi dayaa rasamu ninnaasheerva Dinchenu thandri{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Divya raaraajai kumaarudu oka veyyi Varshaalu paalinchunu mahaa antamuleni Raajya melunu endaru jayamubu nonduduro Andarunu paalinchedaru{/lang-eng}
